definitions.definition: Cast or scattered widely in all directions ; cast abroad .
examples: The seed was broadcast , not drilled.

definitions.definition: Communicated , signalled , or transmitted to many people, through radio waves or electronic means.
Relating to transmissions of messages or signals to many people through radio waves or electronic means.

main_definition: Cast or scattered widely in all directions ; cast abroad .
secondary_definitions: Communicated , signalled , or transmitted to many people, through radio waves or electronic means.
( attributive ) Relating to transmissions of messages or signals to many people through radio waves or electronic means.
